journey_strive_begin: The road stretched out in front of us.
We set out again on our travels.
The rising sun found us on the road again.
The life of a traveler is one of change.
Soon after, the dust of the road covered our clothes again.
Walking is a contemplative practice for some and an excuse to complain for others.
We left that place behind us and continued our journey.
journey_strive_middle: As I walked, I recited the story of how I had ended up on this path.
We paused when we saw that we were passing a local herder.
The shade of a tree was a welcome respite.
Despite the distance, we were careful to pace ourselves.
Sometimes travellers have been known to come to a bad end in this region.
When we were there, the place seemed peaceful enough.
The distance was greater than it had looked that morning.
Contemplating a journey is not the same as actually walking there.
I passed the time by singing to myself.
You might be surprised to know that #journey_strive_personal_detail#.
It wasn't something I mentioned to my fellow travellers, but #journey_strive_personal_detail.
journey_strive_end: But all journeys, no matter how short or long, must come to an end.
After a longer time than I wished, I found myself in a new place.
One foot in front of the other enough times, and you are there.
Eventually, we saw that there were other travellers gathering ahead of us. We had arrived.
I was approaching my next destination.
journey_strive_personal_detail: it had been a long time since I had thought of the home I had left
I felt energized by the new sights
I was retraining myself from constantly looking over my shoulder
I was practicing imitating the birds that we had heard
I was contemplating my next decision
I was having an interal debate about destiny and fate
I occasionally doubted that I had made the right choice by coming here
rtuc_one: spoke to me in low tones
spoke loudly, as if to fill the silence,
wanted to take action as we talked
had to be restrained after we learned
rtuc_two: which I saw demonstrated the depths of their emotions
and contemplated the troubles in this world

failing to honor well-established traditions and limits
receiving guidance from a higher power
becoming a channel of divine will

using cheap illusions to dazzle others

listening to your feelings and intuitions
rejecting guidance from spirit or intuition
refusing to become involved, even when involvement is appropriate
mothering those around you in positive ways
inhibiting productivity by obsessing on productivity
being in control of yourself and others
tempering aggressive masculinity with wisdom and experience
crushing the creativity of others with a rigid, iron-fisted approach
insisting on getting your own way
using overt force to achieve your goals and maintain order
